about_the_game: A mysterious voice in the night awakens young Cynthia. Lost and frightened, the voice pleads for aid. Cynthia puts her creativity to work as she puzzles out a way to help it, the first of many such challenges awaiting our young hero in this digitally hand-drawn point and click adventure.
